faq_data.question: What nutritional information do you provide on your products?
faq_data.answer: We provide detailed nutritional information on all our products. Each item features a nutrition label that includes calories, macronutrients (fats, proteins, carbohydrates), vitamins, and minerals. This information helps customers make informed choices based on their dietary needs.

faq_data.question: What is your return policy for unsatisfied customers?
faq_data.answer: We aim to ensure customer satisfaction. If you are not satisfied with a product, you may return it within 30 days of purchase for a full refund or exchange. The product must be in its original packaging and unused. For more details, please contact our customer service team.

faq_data.question: How can I contact customer support?
faq_data.answer: Our customer support team is available 24/7 to assist you. You can reach us via phone, email, or live chat on our website. We strive to respond to all inquiries promptly to ensure your questions are answered.
